org.orgName: The District Court of the United States, Western District of Washington, Northern Division

div1.p: Government of the Province of Saskatchewan

I hereby Certify that ALEXANDER JOSEPH GORDON MacECHEN of REGINA in the Province of Saskatchewan was on the FIFTEENTH day of FEBRUARY, 1919 duly appointed a JUSTICE OF THE PEACE in and for the said Province, that the commission of the said ALEXANDER JOSEPH GORDON MacECHEN in that behalf has never been revoked and that he is at this date a JUSTICE OF THE PEACE as aforesaid, and as such is a person before whom proof may be made of the execution of deeds and other instruments by the law of the said Province.
Given under my hand at Regina, in the said Province, this TWELFTH day of AUGUST, 1921
I, Frederick John Charles Edwards, of the City of REgina, in the Provines of Saskatchewan, Acting Deputy Provincial Secretary of the Province of Saskatchewan.

1. THAT I am now and have been since October 6th, A.D. 1920, Acting Deputy Provincial Secretary for the Province of Saskatchewan, and as such am by law entrusted with the custody of the records of the appointments of all Notaries Public.

2. THAT all appointments of Notaries Public are made by Order of the Lieutenant Governor in Council and that the records of such appointments are kept by me in my office and are under my custody and control.

3. THAT annexed hereto and marked as Exhibit "A" to this Declaration is a certificate of the appointment of William Fabyan Windeatt, of the City of Regina, as a Notary Public in and for the Province of Saskatchewan, and that the seal impressed upon the said certificate is the authorized seal of the said Province.
4. THAT the appointment of the said William Fabyan Windeatt has not been revoked and is still in full force.
AND I MAKE this solemn declaration conscientiously believing it to be true, and knowing that it is of the same force and effect as if made under oath and by virtue of "THE CANADA EVIDENCE ACT".
DECLARED before me at the City of Regina, in the Province of Saskatchewan, Canada, this twelfth day of August, A.D. 1921.
A Notary Public in and for the Province of Saskatchewan.
